name: Ascendro Technologies
tagline: We build powerful applications for web
description:
Ascendro Technologies is a software development agency specialized in custom web solutions. Our team masters Java, PHP and Operations support (including 24/7 services). We have completed challenging projects for BMW, Samsung and other demanding customers.
We have offices in Romania (Main Development Center), Germany (Project Management), New Zealand (Development and Support) and Canada (Project Management).
Our core team has 19 people and our network of external partners has another 7-8 people.
We offer the following expertise areas:
Project Management
Software Development and Architecture
Testing and Quality Assurance
DevOps, 24/7 Support and Server Administration
Custom solutions developed by Ascendro:
Various applications for car sharing industry (BMW)
Incident management solutions
Inventory systems
Sales Leads verification applications
Quiz platforms
Deployment management solutions
Recommendation platforms
Fleet management solutions
Other custom applications for startups and well established companies
Technology keywords: Java, JavaEE, LAMP, JSON Schemas, JWT, NodeJS ,Websocket, REST
Languages keywords: Java, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
Database keywords: MySQL, Redis, Mongo DB, Aerospike, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, PostgreSQL
Frameworks and more: Yii Framework, Spring, Angular, Amazon Stack (EC2, RDS, ES, OpsWorks, Reoute 53, SES, SNS, EMR), ActiveMQ, Apache Hive, Apache Jersey, Apache Jetty, Apache SPARK, Apache Tomcat, Apache2 Web Server, jBPM, Zeppelin, Hibernate
Tools keywords: Docker, Kubernetes, jUnit, PHPUnit, Selenium, Mocha, Maven, Gradle, Make, ANT, Sonarqube, Jenkins, SVN, GIT / Github / BitBucket, Gitolite, Jira, Redmine, Vagrant, Chef, Kibana, NewRelic, SSL
